record.field:
fields_to_watch = ( 'name', 'barcode', 'description', 'product_brand_id', 'image', 'tag_ids', 'product_brand_id', 'public_categ_ids', 'type', 'company_id', 'website_published', 'weight', 'origin_country_id', 'product_size_width', 'product_size_height', 'product_size_depth' )
def is_notifiable(self, action, vals): # Los productos no se envían cuando se crean sino cuando se pulsa el botón de publicar+ return self.website_published
def get_data(self, action): return { 'jim_id': self.id, 'name': self.get_field_translations('name'), 'reference': self.template_code or self.default_code, 'ean13': self.barcode if self.barcode and self.has_valid_barcode() else None, 'category_id': self.tag_ids.ids, 'web_category_id': self.public_categ_ids.ids, 'brand_id': self.product_brand_id.id if self.product_brand_id else None, 'description': self.get_field_translations('description'), 'origin_country': self.origin_country_id.name if self.origin_country_id else None, 'weight': float(self.weight), 'width': float(self.product_size_width), 'height': float(self.product_size_height), 'length': float(self.product_size_depth), 'volume': float(self.volume), 'image': b2b['images_base'] + self.public_image_name if self.public_image_name else None }
def pos_data(self, action): # Creamos los datos relaccionados if b2b['crud_mode'] == 'create': # Crear las variantes for variant in self.product_variant_ids: variant.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Crear las imágenes de la plantilla (que no tienen atributos) for image in self.env['product.image'].search([('product_tmpl_id', '=', self.id), ('product_attributes_values', '=', False)]): image.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Crear la parametrización if 'product.parameterization' in self.env: for p in self.env['product.parameterization'].search([('product_tmpl_id', '=', self.id)]): p.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Previsión de abastecimiento for stock_move in self.product_variant_id.stock_move_ids: stock_move.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Enviar precios y stock self.env['b2b.export'].with_context(b2b_notify=True).b2b_pricelists_prices(templates_filter=[self.id,]) self.env['b2b.export'].with_context(b2b_notify=True).b2b_customers_prices(templates_filter=[self.id,]) self.env['b2b.export'].with_context(b2b_notify=True).b2b_products_stock(export_all=[self.id,])

fields_to_watch = ( 'default_code', 'name', 'barcode', 'product_tmpl_id', 'attribute_names', 'attribute_value_ids', 'weight', 'website_published', 'product_size_width', 'product_size_height', 'product_size_depth' )
def is_notifiable(self, action, vals): return (self.product_tmpl_id.website_published # La plantilla está publicada and self.default_code # Y tiene código and self.attribute_names # Y tiene atributos (las variantes únicas no tienen atributos) and len(self.attribute_value_ids) == 2 # Y tiene 2 atributos and self.website_published) # Y está publicada
def related_to(self, action): return 'product.template,%s' % self.product_tmpl_id.id
def get_data(self, action): return { 'jim_id': self.id, 'product_id': self.product_tmpl_id.id, 'reference': self.default_code, 'attribute_value': self.attribute_value_ids.ids, 'ean13': self.barcode if self.barcode and self.has_valid_barcode() else None, 'weight': float(self.weight), 'width': float(self.product_size_width), 'height': float(self.product_size_height), 'length': float(self.product_size_depth), 'volume': float(self.volume), 'default': bool(self.id == self.product_variant_id.id) }
def pos_data(self, action): # Creamos los datos relaccionados if b2b['crud_mode'] == 'create': # Crear las imágenes del producto for image in self.product_image_ids: if not image.on_jsync(): image.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Previsión de abastecimiento for stock_move in self.stock_move_ids: stock_move.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Enviar precios y stock (de todas las variantes) self.env['b2b.export'].b2b_pricelists_prices(templates_filter=[self.product_tmpl_id.id,], variant=self.id) self.env['b2b.export'].b2b_customers_prices(templates_filter=[self.product_tmpl_id.id,], variant=self.id) self.env['b2b.export'].b2b_products_stock(export_all=[self.product_tmpl_id.id,])
# Eliminamos la imágen relaccionada si procede if b2b['crud_mode'] == 'delete': for image in self.product_image_ids: if image.on_one_product(): image.b2b_record('delete', user_notify=False)

fields_to_watch = ( 'purchase_line_id', 'company_id', 'product_id', 'product_uom_qty', 'date_expected', 'state' )
def is_notifiable(self, action, vals): product_published = self.product_id.product_tmpl_id.website_published variant_published = self.product_id.website_published if self.product_id.attribute_names else product_published return (product_published # El producto relaccionado está publicado and variant_published # La variante relaccionada está publicada and self.purchase_line_id # Viene de una línea de un pedido de compra and self.company_id.id in (1, 5, 6) # La compañía es Jim Sports, Eme Inversia o Grinverter and self.picking_id.picking_type_id.id in (13, 97) # Y el tipo de picking es 'Recepciones (MECALUX) o Recepciones EME' and self.state == 'assigned' # Y el estado es 'assigned' and self.picking_id.picking_type_id.code == 'incoming' # Y es un INT and self.group_id # Y tiene un grupo de abastecimiento and (datetime.strptime(self.date_expected, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") >= datetime.now() or action == 'delete')) # Y la fecha es superior a la actual o es un borrado
def related_to(self, action): return 'product.template,%s' % self.product_id.product_tmpl_id.id
def get_data(self, action): return { 'jim_id': self.id, 'company_id': self.company_id.id, 'order_id': self.purchase_line_id.order_id.id, 'product_id': self.product_id.product_tmpl_id.id, 'variant_id': self.product_id.id if self.product_id.attribute_names else None, 'quantity': self.product_uom_qty if self.state == 'assigned' else 0, 'shipping_date': self.date_expected }

fields_to_watch = ( 'ref', 'name', 'vat', 'email', 'type', 'customer', 'parent_id', 'is_company', 'property_product_pricelist', 'vip_web_access', 'active' )
def is_notifiable(self, action, vals): return (self.active # Está activo and self.is_company # Y es empresa and self.ref # Y tiene una referencia and self.vip_web_access # Y tiene asignada por lo menos una empresa para la web and self.customer # Y es cliente and self.property_product_pricelist and self.property_product_pricelist.id != 1 # Tiene tarifa y no es la publica and self.email and self.has_valid_emails() # Y tiene un email válido and self.type == 'contact') # Y es un contacto
def get_data(self, action): return { 'jim_id': self.id, 'name': self.name, 'vat': self.vat or None, 'email': self.primary_email(), 'reference': self.ref or None, 'customer_pricelists': [tuple([x[0].id, x[1]]) for x in self.get_field_multicompany('property_product_pricelist')], 'companies': self.vip_web_access.ids }
def pos_data(self, action): if b2b['crud_mode'] == 'create': # Creamos las direcciones for child in self.child_ids: child.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Creamos los pedidos for order in self.sale_order_ids: order.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Creamos las facturas # for invoice in self.invoice_ids: Esto no sirve ya que tenemos que coger el campo "Facturar a" for invoice in self.env['account.invoice'].search([('commercial_partner_id', '=', self.id)]): invoice.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False) # Creamos los albaranes for picking in self.env['stock.picking'].search([('partner_id', '=', self.id)]): picking.b2b_record('create', user_notify=False)

fields_to_watch = ( 'name', 'type', 'parent_id', 'street', 'street2', 'zip', 'city', 'state_id', 'country_id', 'commercial_partner_id', 'default_partner_by_type', 'active' )
def is_notifiable(self, action, vals): return (self.active # Está activa and self.type in ('invoice', 'delivery') # Y es de tipo 'invoice' o 'delivery' and self.name != 'DROPSHIPPING' and self.comment != 'DROPSHIPPING-WEB' # Y no es una dirección de dropshipping and self.parent_id.is_notifiable_check() # Y el cliente es notificable and self.parent_id.type == 'contact') # Y el cliente es de tipo contacto (a veces crean una dirección de facturación asociada a otra dirección)
def related_to(self, action): return 'res.partner,%s' % self.parent_id.id
def get_data(self, action): return { 'jim_id': self.id, 'customer_id': self.commercial_partner_id.id, 'name': self.name if self.name else self.commercial_partner_id.name, 'street': self.street, 'street2': self.street2 or None, 'zip': self.zip, 'city': self.city, 'state': self.state_id.name if self.state_id else None, 'country': self.country_id.code if self.country_id else 'ES', 'type': self.type, 'default': self.default_partner_by_type }

fields_to_watch = ( 'commercial_partner_id', 'company_id', 'number', 'date_invoice', 'amount_total', 'state' )
def is_notifiable(self, action, vals): notifiable = (self.number # Tiene un número asignado and self.commercial_partner_id.is_notifiable_check() # Y el cliente es notificable and self.type in ('out_invoice', 'out_refund') # Y es de tipo out_invoice o out_refund and self.state in ('open', 'paid') # Y el estado es abierta o pagada and self.date_invoice >= b2b['min_docs_date']) # Y es posterior a la fecha mínima
if notifiable and b2b['crud_mode'] == 'update' and vals.get('state', 'open') != 'open' and len(vals.keys()) == 1: b2b['logger'].critical("------> [%s] FACTURA NOTIFICABLE PERO NO SE ENVIA CAMBIO DE ESTADO A: %s", self.id, vals.get('state')) notifiable = False
return notifiable
def related_to(self, action): return 'res.partner,%s' % self.commercial_partner_id.id
def get_data(self, action): doc_data = { 'jim_id': self.id }
# If not a delete mode if b2b['crud_mode'] != 'delete': # Obtenemos la moneda y posición currency = self.currency_id.symbol position = self.currency_id.position
# Actualizamos los datos doc_data.update({ 'customer_id': self.commercial_partner_id.id, 'company_id': self.company_id.id, 'name': self.number, 'date': self.date_invoice, 'total': str(self.amount_total) + currency if position == 'after' else currency + str(self.amount_total), 'pdf': self.get_base64_report_pdf('custom_documents.report_picking_grouped_invoice') })
return doc_data

fields_to_watch = ( 'recompute_pack_op', 'orig_sale_id', 'partner_id', 'company_id', 'date_done', 'name', 'state' )
def is_notifiable(self, action, vals): is_out_delivery = (self.picking_type_id.code == 'outgoing' or self.picking_type_id.name == 'Dropship') is_done = self.orig_sale_id and self.date_done and self.state == 'done' notifiable = (is_out_delivery # Es un albarán de salida o dropshipping and is_done # Y está asociado a una venta y tiene fecha de validación y está validado and self.sale_id and self.sale_id.is_notifiable_check() # Y el pedido asociado es notificable and self.date_done >= b2b['min_docs_date']) # Y es posterior a la fecha mínima return notifiable
def related_to(self, action): return 'res.partner,%s' % self.sale_id.partner_id.commercial_partner_id.id
def get_data(self, action): doc_data = { 'jim_id': self.id }
# If not a delete mode if b2b['crud_mode'] != 'delete': # Obtenemos la moneda y posición currency = self.orig_sale_id.pricelist_id.currency_id.symbol position = self.orig_sale_id.pricelist_id.currency_id.position
# Actualizamos los datos doc_data.update({ 'customer_id': self.sale_id.partner_id.commercial_partner_id.id, 'company_id': self.company_id.id, 'name': self.name, 'date': self.date_done, 'total': str(self.amount_total) + currency if position == 'after' else currency + str(self.amount_total), 'pdf': self.get_base64_report_pdf('stock.report_deliveryslip') })
return doc_data
